description: Substitute Panutche Camara rescues a precious point for struggling Crawley in the last minute as the Red Devils hold play-off chasing Reading.
title: Crawley Town 1-1 Reading
title_page: Crawley Town 1-1 Reading: Panutche Camara earns point for hosts - BBC Sport
maintext:
This will be just the second ever Football League meeting between Crawley Town and Reading after the Royals won the reverse fixture 4-1 in October last year.
Reading will be visiting the Broadfield Stadium for the second time for a competitive match after beating Crawley Town 3-1 on their prior visit during the FA Cup third round in January 2013.
Crawley have won just one of their last seven home league games (D3 L3), failing to keep a clean sheet during that time.
